text.en: Guiding light of this world, crowning glory of the Śākya clan,
text.en-trans: mi jé zhing gi drenpa shakyé tok

text.en: Seniormost of buddha’s heirs, precious wisdom’s treasure,
text.en-trans: gyalsé tuwo jetsün khyenpé ter

text.en: Successors to these teachings, noble Nāgārjuna and your spiritual sons,
text.en-trans: tenpé tsalak pakpa yabsé sok

text.en: I prostrate before you all, the supreme of guides for living beings!
text.en-trans: drowé dren chok nam la chaktsal lo

text.en: Buddhapālita, you who realized the Middle Way beyond extremes,
text.en-trans: tadral umé dön zik sangye kyang

text.en: Master of the bodhisattvas’ enlightened actions, Śāntideva,
text.en-trans: changchub chöpé ngadak zhiwa lha

text.en: Upholder of the great tradition of the Prāsaṅgika, Candrakīrti,
text.en-trans: talgyur shingté sol dzin dawa drak

text.en: Respectfully, I bow before you—think of me with great compassion!
text.en-trans: güpé dü do tsé chen tuk kyi gong

text.en: From this day on, throughout all my future lives,
text.en-trans: dak ni deng né tserab tamché du

text.en: May I gain the freedoms and endowments and meet with buddhas’ teachings.
text.en-trans: daljor lü tob gyalwé ten dang jal

text.en: May I be accepted by an authentic spiritual teacher,
text.en-trans: tsennyi denpé geweshé kyi zin

text.en: Whom I follow well, with all three kinds of faith!1
text.en-trans: nam sum depé tsulzhin tenpar shok

text.en: Having fully received instructions from my supreme and noble guide,
text.en-trans: ngedön zabmö do yi gongpa zhin

text.en: On the definitive meaning that is the intent of the profoundest sūtras,
text.en-trans: shenyen chok lé lekpar tob né kyang

text.en: May I reach conclusive certainty through the three kinds of wisdom,2
text.en-trans: sherab sum gyi ten la pabpé tü

text.en: And gain the conviction of one who relies upon the Dharma!
text.en-trans: chöjé drangwé depa tobpar shok

text.en: Taking faith and great compassion as the basis of my path,
text.en-trans: dé dang nyingjé chenpö zhi zung né

text.en: And never forgetting the Three Jewels, the sources of refuge,
text.en-trans: kyab kyi yul du könchok mi tong zhing

text.en: May I embark fully upon the path of the Mahāyāna,
text.en-trans: tekpa chenpö lam la rab zhuk té

text.en: And arouse a mind of bodhicitta that is uncontrived!
text.en-trans: chöma minpé semkyé tobpar shok

text.en: With the courageous willingness to sacrifice even life and limb,
text.en-trans: lü sok yalwar dorwé nyingtob kyi

text.en: May I give away to others all that I own and have within myself,
text.en-trans: chinang ngö kün zhen la tongwa dang

text.en: And, guarding my mindstream with the purest moral discipline,
text.en-trans: namdak trim kyi rang gi gyü dam né

text.en: May I never stray beyond the boundaries of my vows!
text.en-trans: chepé tsam lé dawa mepar shok

text.en: Seeing all who do me harm as equal to some priceless treasure,
text.en-trans: nöjé nam la rinchen ter zhindu

text.en: May I honour them with a mind of joy and great respect,
text.en-trans: ga dang güpé yi kyi rab tü dé

text.en: And always, in all my lives to come, may I rely
text.en-trans: nyingjé drangwé mejung chöpa yang

text.en: Upon this wondrous conduct born of a noble heart!
text.en-trans: tserab küntu dak gi tenpar shok

text.en: The naturally pure, ultimate space of all phenomena
text.en-trans: rangzhin namdak döndam chö kyi ying

text.en: Is entirely beyond the realm of concepts such as ‘is’ or ‘is not.’
text.en-trans: yömé tröpé yul lerab depa

text.en: May my failure to understand and false ideas be cleared away,
text.en-trans: ma tok lokpar tokpé kyön sal té

text.en: So that I come to see the truth of reality itself directly.
text.en-trans: chönyi denpa ngönsum tongwar shok

text.en: Views based on existence and non-existence are limiting ideas,
text.en-trans: yö dang mepar tawa tröpé ta

text.en: Clinging to both and to neither is the product of a mistaken mind.
text.en-trans: nyi dang nyimin dzinpa lokpé lo

text.en: The Middle Way is free from these four extremes of elaboration,
text.en-trans: ta zhi trö dang dralwa umé lam

text.en: May I see this reality that the learned ones have taught!
text.en-trans: khepé tenpé denyi tongwar shok

text.en: All outer and inner things are not produced by themselves,
text.en-trans: chinang chö kün dak lé kyemé ching

text.en: Or from something else, from both or without cause at all.
text.en-trans: zhen lé mayin nyi dang gyumé min

text.en: With regard to all the things that are known in this world,
text.en-trans: jikten rabtu drakpé chö nam la

text.en: May I adopt and avoid, engage in and withdraw from what I should.
text.en-trans: langdor jukdok tsulzhin jepar shok

text.en: May I abandon all falsely conceived notions of a self,
text.en-trans: dak pung ngowo chik dang tadé sok

text.en: Thinking it is identical to the aggregates, distinct from them and so on,
text.en-trans: lokpar tokpé dushé künpang té

text.en: And, through the sevenfold reasoning of the chariot,
text.en-trans: nam dün shingté rikpa la ten né

text.en: May I gain certainty that it is but a dependent imputation!
text.en-trans: ten né takpé ngepa nyepar shok

text.en: All knowable things have always been empty by their very essence.
text.en-trans: shejé chö kün ngowo döné tong

text.en: May I now eliminate entirely the pain of conceptual thoughts,
text.en-trans: ter zuk né dang chungzé nepa sok

text.en: With their mode of perceiving which obscures genuine reality,
text.en-trans: yangdak dön la dribpé dzintang kyi

text.en: Thinking for example that things abide forever or even partially persist.
text.en-trans: tokpé zukngu drung né jinpar shok

text.en: May the excellent meaning that is conveyed through examples
text.en-trans: do kham ser dang bum nang drön sok kyi

text.en: Such as gold within rock, or a lamp inside a vase be revealed.
text.en-trans: pé yi zhalwé dön zang ngön du gyur

text.en: According to the vision of the noble father, glorious protector Nāgārjuna,
text.en-trans: yab jé palgön lu yi gongpa zhin

text.en: And may I complete all the stages and paths to gain the dharmakāya!
text.en-trans: salam tarchin chöku tobpar shok

text.en: Then may I manifest continuously in many billions of emanations,
text.en-trans: detsé chok tar tukpé gyalsé dang

text.en: To all the buddha’s heirs throughout the far reaches of space itself,
text.en-trans: men dang chok gi dro kham gyatso la

text.en: And to infinite oceans of beings of every type, lesser and greater,
text.en-trans: rang rang lo dang tünpé dul jé ni

text.en: Guiding each and every one according to their mind’s capacity!
text.en-trans: jewa trak gyar taktu nangwar shok

text.en: From now until I reach that perfect level of attainment,
text.en-trans: detar gopang nampar chi kyi bar

text.en: In all my lives, may I realize and skilfully teach to others
text.en-trans: tserab küntu tadral umé dön

text.en: The meaning of the Middle Way beyond all extremes,
text.en-trans: rang gi tok shing zhen la tön khepa

text.en: Becoming the equal of glorious Āryadeva!
text.en-trans: palden pakpa lha dang nyampar shok
